title: 03/04/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/04/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to NFL Draft Analyst Daniel Jeremiah about whether Kenny Pickett's small hands will affect his Draft stock. The guys measure their hands, and the person with the smallest hands will shock you! And Lakers writer Dan Woike discusses whether he thinks LeBron can win a title within the next couple years.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
